data.title: David Mamet – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about David Mamet. Browse David Mamet’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Everywhere an Oink Oink

An Embittered, Dyspeptic, and Accurate Report of Forty Years in Hollywood

By: David Mamet

Narrated by: Jim Frangione

Length: 6 hrs and 19 mins

Unabridged

Overall

3.5 out of 5 stars 57

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 51

Story

3.5 out of 5 stars 51

Award-winning playwright, screenwriter, and director David Mamet shares his “smart, addictive, hilarious, and insightful” (Breitbart) tales from his four decades in Hollywood where he worked with some of the biggest names in movies.

2 out of 5 stars

Poor Mr. Mamet

By Joe on 02-03-24

The Secret Knowledge

On the Dismantling of American Culture

By: David Mamet

Narrated by: Johnny Heller

Length: 6 hrs and 46 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 313

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 270

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 269

For the past 30 years, David Mamet has been a controversial and defining force in theater and film, championing the most cherished liberal values along the way.....

5 out of 5 stars

Mamet's Rubicon

By Kirk on 08-13-11

A broad-ranging journey through history, the Bible, and literature, RECESSIONAL examines how politics and cultural attitudes about rebellion have shifted in the United States in the last generation....
